Message.Msg: This might have sounded better about ten years ago. Flaunting placements in businesses that are closing stores faster than I can type this message isn't a great selling tactic.

nothingmissing I agree. In fact it's dangerous to place products with businesses that are not doing well. If they BK you dont get paid and often you cant get your product back. I could not print the full story because the bulletin board did not let me post a message when i typed too many cos. names. They are going into 120 Walmarts and 160 Walgreens.

I talked with investor relations with the company and was told the man that introduced Red Bull to Europe is working on introducing the companies products to Europe. You may not follow that company but it has the highest volume sales of energy drinks in the world, with over 5 Billion cans sold annually.
